template.name: Template Dell PowerConnect 54xx
template.description:
Templete monitors cpu, memory, temperature, fans, power etc.
Add macro {$SNMP_COMMUNITY} to host.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} CPU Over 85 %
trigger.description: {HOST.NAME} has had a CPU Utilization above 85 % for 3 samples taken in the last 1 minute 30 seconds.
